rules_text:
Create X 2/2 black Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of Stations you control. You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
Stationcycling {1}{G} [i]({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Station card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“We only get one shot, make it count.”[/i]
